news_header: Evo Morales claims assassination attempt after his vehicle was shot at, while other news covers various incidents in Latin America.
news_text: Former Bolivian president Evo Morales reported that his vehicle was shot at, alleging an assassination attempt. Video evidence shows him ducking as passengers react to the gunfire, with two bullet holes in the windshield. Morales's party blamed the current government, while President Luis Arce condemned the violence and promised an investigation. Other news highlights include protests in Buenos Aires against pension reforms, a plane crash in São Paulo, and the aftermath of Hurricane Beryl in the Caribbean.
